greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients of characteristic polynomial of negative Pascal matrix with (i,j)-th entry -C(i+j-2,i-1).
link: P. Di Francesco, P. Zinn-Justin and J.-B. Zuber, Determinant Formulae for some Tiling Problems and Application to Fully Packed Loops, arXiv:math-ph/0410002, 2004.
W. F. Lunnon, The Pascal matrix, Fib. Quart. vol. 15 (1977) pp. 201-204.
mathematica: P[n_] := Table[Binomial[i + j - 2, i - 1], {i, 1, n}, {j, 1, n}];
row[n_] := CoefficientList[ CharacteristicPolynomial[P[n], x], x] // Abs;
xref: Sum of k-th row is A006366(n). Columns give A006134, A006135, A006136.
results.author: _Fred Lunnon_, Dec 11 1999
